questions: How to use Mautic MA with ThamesThrive?
What is the extension needed to use Mautic MA with ThamesThrive?
How to install the extension Mautic MA in Resource/Extensions?
answer:
# Can ThamesThrive use Mautic MA, an open-source marketing automation platform with lead management, campaign management, and email features?
Yes. To use Mautic MA, install the extension Mautic MA in Resource/Extensions.
